query:
SELECT 
  a.id as assetId, 
  a.name as assetName, 
  a.replacementValue,
  a.yearBuilt,
  p.id as projectId,
  p.name as projectName,
  p.currentReplacementValue as projectCRV,
  p.deferredMaintenanceCost as projectDMC,
  p.fciScore as projectFCI,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM assessments ass WHERE ass.assetId = a.id AND ass.deletedAt IS NULL AND (ass.hidden = 0 OR ass.hidden IS NULL)) as assessmentCount,
  (SELECT AVG(CASE 
    WHEN ass.condition = 'excellent' THEN 90
    WHEN ass.condition = 'good' THEN 75
    WHEN ass.condition = 'fair' THEN 55
    WHEN ass.condition = 'poor' THEN 30
    WHEN ass.condition = 'critical' THEN 10
    ELSE 50 END) 
    FROM assessments ass WHERE ass.assetId = a.id AND ass.deletedAt IS NULL AND (ass.hidden = 0 OR ass.hidden IS NULL)) as avgConditionFromConditionField,
  (SELECT AVG(ass.conditionPercentage) FROM assessments ass WHERE ass.assetId = a.id AND ass.deletedAt IS NULL AND (ass.hidden = 0 OR ass.hidden IS NULL) AND ass.conditionPercentage IS NOT NULL) as avgConditionPercentage
FROM assets a
INNER JOIN projects p ON a.projectId = p.id
WHERE p.deletedAt IS NULL
LIMIT 10;

  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM assessments ass WHERE ass.assetId = a.id AND ass.deletedAt IS NULL AND (ass.hidden = 0 OR ass.hidden IS NULL)) as assessmentCount,
  (SELECT AVG(CASE 
    WHEN ass.condition = 'excellent' THEN 90

    WHEN ass.condition = 'poor' THEN 30
    WHEN ass.condition = 'critical' THEN 10
    ELSE 50 END) 
    FROM assessments ass WHERE ass.assetId = a.id AND ass.deletedAt IS NULL AND (ass.hidden = 0 OR ass.hidden IS NULL)) as avgConditionFromConditionField,
  (SELECT AVG(ass.conditionPercentage) FROM assessments ass WHERE ass.assetId = a.id AND ass.deletedAt IS NULL AND (ass.hidden = 0 OR ass.hidden IS NULL) AND ass.conditionPercentage IS NOT NULL) as avgConditionPercentage
FROM assets a
INNER JOIN projects p ON a.projectId = p.id
WHERE p.deletedAt IS NULL
LIMIT 10;
